Articles.Content: Just knock off one of her towers and then leave, the drek will probably flip if it tries to move and you don't have to waste ammo on her armour.

Just knock off one of her towers and then leave, the drek will probably flip if it tries to move and you don't have to waste ammo on her armour.

Both those towers look light. The Drek would barely notice if one was gone.

Both those towers look light. The Drek would barely notice if one was gone.

pretty much XD They are just there because i didn't have room inside the armor plating for it, so i put the least valuable equipment on them. THey're really light, only about 4 tonnes each. Plus, the Drek can go straight even with one engine down; I doubt two little towers make a difference. Hell, she can lose half her armor and keep straight.
Okay, I'm just setting up the battle, shouldn't be long now, sorry for the inconvenience.

Zekes comeback and everything kicks off.

Hey Zekes, How about we redo the setup of the first battle.

Fighter-Destroyer-Fighter vs Frigate-Battlecruiser(Drek XXX?)-Frigate
I'm going to have to wait for my internet to stop buggering around before I can upload the persistent file.
I built a fighter (or at least a prototype) and a bomber (that needs some kind of teleported to be flown to orbit)
Also, I need to know how to make shredders for my ships, I still don't know how to make them.

Also, I need to know how to make shredders for my ships, I still don't know how to make them.

Shredders bascally are homebrew guided missiles with shrapnel clipped inside them, all built around a high-impact core. However, they also can be a tad bit tricky to use, and do heavily boost your partcount. Another drawback is that ultra-rigid hulls sometimes bounce Shredders.

That's why a couple of my ships use them, but the rest use AP-tipped SRBs.

Also, I need to know how to make shredders for my ships, I still don't know how to make them.

Not that difficult. Take a 1x1 panel, put a warhead on it, put a lot of thrust behind it, and slap a docking port and decoupler on each end.

Not that difficult. Take a 1x1 panel, put a warhead on it, put a lot of thrust behind it, and slap a docking port and decoupler on each end.

Yep, that's pretty much it XD Althoug the new Drek XIV-V can now take several shredders before getting disabled, and the armor still hasn't been broken (mabye my missiles are just bad?)

Can I has download? i want to shoot things at it XD

I shot things at a Drek...

However, I have to say that your new Drek is pretty darn tough (it also may have been a matter of phys-lag ), as it shrugged off all an SRB and a quad-salvo of i-beam rounds, leaving only the 1.25m rounds in it's launch tube broken. That's pretty darn good, seeing as the ship could still run.

I will be uploading the SX-10 soon, once Dropbox (which I've been using lately) starts working again.

Also, this made me realize how large the SX-10 is compared to a Drek...

Yep, that's pretty much it XD Althoug the new Drek XIV-V can now take several shredders before getting disabled, and the armor still hasn't been broken (mabye my missiles are just bad?)

Nah, I just think 0.25's going to be an update where it's going to require more firepower to seriously damage capital ships.

EDIT: Ok, Dropbox's working for me now, here's a DL:

Edited October 14, 2014 by ScriptKitt3h

That Drek is just incredible! I've never seen a ship that can take damage like that. I remember a while ago we were at the point of deciding that armour was pretty much pointless as anything could get through.

My only problems with the Drek series compared to the Co series is lack of range and acceleration.

Oh yea, Frozen can join me in the Lathe party station(I'm so lonely)

C'mon Zekes stretch those space legs.

lack of range and acceleration.

That's why the SX-10 has 4 LVNs, with two 2.5 meter tanks providing fuel (each is 1/2 a Jumbo-64, giving the ship a massive range).

Anyone interested in doing a space battle?

That Drek is just incredible! I've never seen a ship that can take damage like that. I remember a while ago we were at the point of deciding that armour was pretty much pointless as anything could get through.

My only problems with the Drek series compared to the Co series is lack of range and acceleration.

I shot things at a Drek...

However, I have to say that your new Drek is pretty darn tough (it also may have been a matter of phys-lag ), as it shrugged off all an SRB and a quad-salvo of i-beam rounds, leaving only the 1.25m rounds in it's launch tube broken. That's pretty darn good, seeing as the ship could still run.

I will be uploading the SX-10 soon, once Dropbox (which I've been using lately) starts working again.

Also, this made me realize how large the SX-10 is compared to a Drek...

Nah, I just think 0.25's going to be an update where it's going to require more firepower to seriously damage capital ships.

Wait which ship are you guys firing at? The XXV? Every time I shoot at it it breaks in half.... thats strange XD

@Spartwo, I'm on my way, I just fitted some long range fuel tanks to the XIV's, they should get me there. We'll see

Oh yea, Frozen can join me in the Lathe party station(I'm so lonely)

Sadly don't have any military ships that can get there atm. I'm trying to update a few.

Laythe party station

*Hops in SX-10 Tart-Cart*

"Alright men, set course for Laythe!"

How do you possibly aim this thing? They just flew on either side of the ship

also, 810 parts + 550 part drek = not even my computer lieks this

Veery carefully...

Veery carefully...

BTW my computer is acting up ATM, could you take a few Drek missiles and see how well your armor stands up to them? (I would like to know)

BTW my computer is acting up ATM, could you take a few Drek missiles and see how well your armor stands up to them? (I would like to know)

Sure thing, since I was meaning to run some tests in a fresh "firing range" save.

So, like I said earlier, is anyone interested in doing a space battle at say... Vall?

I'll set up if someone accepts.

I would fight you! If we can raise max range to 3 km ( i REALLY don't want to be in load range of those ships; it would be much less laggy)

Also,

THIS

IS

ADORABLE

The Drekevak XXVII. It's 100% new design, but it's basically a Drekevak XIV armor, MORE FUEL (4400L inside FYI Spartwo) with the fuel tanks in smarter positions, and smaller profile (it's an XIV on a diet)... Weight is 93 tonnes and carries 4 missiles, and is only $184,000 so she's more economical than an XIV. Might just be the perfect replacement for XIV-IVs.

Edited October 15, 2014 by zekes
